document_data.name: Maple
document_data.mainbody: '''Maple''' was a type of broad-leafed deciduous [[:Category:Trees|tree]].
document_data.Varieties: The red maple could be found in the [[midwood]] area of the forest of [[Cormanthor]].<ref>
document_data.Habitats:
* Maples were one of the three primary trees that grew in the [[King's Forest]] of [[Cormyr]]. Beyond there, they could occasionally be found throughout the lowlands of the Cormyr countryside.<ref>{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2007)/Cormyr Countryside}}
* Maples were quite common in Cormanthor. They were particularly known to surround [[Lake Sember]] and to be found in the [[Flooded Forest]].
* In [[the Dalelands]] region, maple trees could be found in the [[Battledale]] in the forests around [[Essembra]] and [[Hap]]. They could also be found throughout [[Harrowdale]].
* Maples were known to grow in the [[Reaching Woods]] in [[west Faer√ªn]].
* Maples were known to grow in the forests of the lowlands of the [[Moonshae Isles]].
* Maples were known to grow in the [[Long Forest]].
* In the [[Unapproachable East]], these trees were known to grow in [[Thay]] and the higher elevated reaches of the [[Yuirwood]]. In the former, they were cultivated on tree plantations where they were harvested by slaves.
* In the [[Western Heartlands]], maples were known to grow in the [[Reaching Woods]].
document_data.Usage:
Maple wood could be used to construct farming tools such as [[pitchfork]]s, [[shovel]]s, and [[winnowing flail]]s. It was also a popular wood used in the construction of [[mapcase]]s.

[[Maple sap|Sap]] from maple trees was used as a sweetener{{Cite dungeon/60/Nemesis|42-56}}
